or you can add more clicks.
[code]        entityDef.actions[2] = "?";[/code]

or you can add more clicks.

item.title: Click meh
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

yeah i’ve posted here somewhat frequently recently, but im doing some creative work
In entitydef.java in the client how would i create a new npc. I know the synthax and all that fun stuff, but if i wanted to make a new custom npc that looks like a current npc just with a diffrent name how would i do that? Like heres an average code.

if(i == 82) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 3; entityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.models = new int[5]; entityDef.models[0] = 17391; entityDef.models[1] = 17375; entityDef.models[2] = 17384; entityDef.models[3] = 17388; entityDef.models[4] = 17390; entityDef.standAnim = 66; entityDef.walkAnim = 63; entityDef.name = "Lesser Demon"; entityDef.combatLevel = 82; entityDef.description = "Lesser, but still Scary".getBytes(); }

how would i edit that to load a current npc? i know im being a bit weird but it’s kinda hard to explain.

Read full topic
